thought: I need to craft red_dye first, and then use the red_dye to craft pink_dye, and finally use the pink_dye to craft pink_stained_glass. The red_dye requires a red_tulip, and the only red_tulip is at slot 42, so I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
